title: Crime Alert 10.19.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.19.18
description:
Grieving widow kills herself and children after husband dies, but he faked his death. Uber driver charged with felony kidnapping. A senior treasury official in hot water over leaked documents related to the Robert Mueller investigation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
